	

		//>>>> Luck SheepStick
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick"							"Luck SheepStick"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_Description"				"<h1>Active: Hex</h1>Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for %sheep_duration% seconds. The target has a base movement speed of %sheep_movement_speed% and will be silenced, muted, and disarmed. Instantly destroys illusions.Cast Range: %tooltip_range%"		
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_Lore"					""
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_Note0"					"Buy The Scepter!"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_bonus_agility"			"+$agi"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_bonus_intellect"			"+$int"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_bonus_strength"			"+$str"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_bonus_mana_regen"		"+$mana_regen"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_bonus_health_regen"		"+Health regeneration"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_mjz_luck_sheepstick_sheep_chance"			"%Chance: "

		"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_mjz_luck_sheepstick_target"						"Luck SheepStick"
